channel.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
channel.description:
Good day folks,
So, I was wondering, does the BlackMesa Team have any future projects they are going to work on? If that is the case, I would love to see a Deus-Ex remade with the current SDK released by Epic Games. That would be [b]Epic.[/b] :3
If they are going to work on other projects, what would you folks like to see? :slight_smile:

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: doggie015
item.description:
Let’s not get too excited… they need to get the mod out first!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: tonkat
item.description:
xalener:

You don’t need to “think up” l4d sequels.

but i will any way. L4D Left 4 Dinner. i called like half an hour ago but im still gonna be late. just stick it in the oven.

item.dc:creator: Frozen_Cham
item.description:
Hmm… Something tell me that the mod will be continued in this short future. If devs will release the multiplayer mode very soooooooon, it’d be very appreciated.
MP is like a demo of full game, everyone’s expecting that.

cheer from thailand. we all love you.

EDIT: retract

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
jesse:

Itd be cool if they could bring us some extra maps in the future and maybe even some extra gamemodes.

Team Deathmatch - Security Guards Vs HECU
Team Deathmatch Apocalypse - Security Guards Vs HECU Vs NPC Aliens (attack both sides)
Rescue/Capture the Scientist - Don’t know whether this should be Capture the flag or whether there is just one scientist in the middle of the arena
Invasion - More and more waves of Aliens or HECU appear, similar to UT2003 invasion mode
Assault - Security Guards defend, HECU attacks

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?

item.description:
Next project? Isn’t it a little too early to talk about their next project when they haven’t even released their current one?

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: KenCastle
item.description:
Kaweebo:

We’ve got several more mods remaking OP4 and Blue Shift, and one even remaking an old mod: Black Ops Source.

I’m drooling over those too as much as I am BM.

After the mod gets released I honestly think the BM team deserves a rest on the beaches of Hawaii with a bunch of naked girls [or guys if that’s your thing] :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
It’s not like the Black Mesa team are the best (or only) people doing remakes like this. Several other teams have made and finished mods as far back as the early 2000’s. So when it is released, and the BM team does break up, it won’t be that bad of a thing. We’ve got several more mods remaking OP4 and Blue Shift, and one even remaking an old mod: Black Ops Source. I think the Decay mod is dead though.

EDIT: It’s not.

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: Legacy
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Before anyone else comes trolling, I’ll quickly say this:

It is highly unlikely that the BM team will stay together post release. Likely elements of the core team will stick around to balance multiplayer content with updates, but there will NOT be any singleplayer work done by the team after BM ships.

Check the FAQ and the Wiki.

That’s a shame, from the videos and screenshots I have seen of BlackMesa, the game will be amazing. I am sure they can turn other oldies into gems just like BlackMesa. I would even be willing to pay $20 for BlackMesa and a Deus-Ex Remake.

robot_deodorant:

etb is correct -

And I will seriously be appreciating their efforts.

I hear you, multiplayer would be very welcome indeed and very much appreciated, I really hope they complete that part of the game after they released the mod. :3

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: robot_deodorant
item.description:
etb is correct -

ShadowNate:

Will you throw a release party […] in the immediate post-release period?

Raminator:

No, we’ll resume work on deathmatch…

And I will seriously be appreciating their efforts.

Read full topic

item.title: BlackMesa Team's next project?
item.dc:creator: etb513
item.description:
After they release single player, I believe Ram said they are gonna jump right into the beta for multiplayer. Beyond that, who knows - most of them will probably go on their own way and hopefully having the project on their resume will open doors for them.
